description: Crafting purpose-built internal systems for seamless logistics management, ensuring optimal resource orchestration.
Played a key role constructing and keeping tabs on the website and internal systems, masterminded the tech stack setup, and ensured the team had their tasks lined up for a smooth workflow.
I took care of the Flutter apps, giving them a performance boost when needed and throwing in some cool new features.
Pitched in to build the company's website and services, created websites for clients, and dabbled in some internal product work.
